source: Nous croyons que le traitement des Premières Nations et des Inuits par le Canada est l'illustration même d'un système raciste et discriminant envers les Autochtones.
reference: We believe that Canada’s treatment of first nations and the Inuit is the epitome of a racist system that discriminates against first nations.
mt: We believe that Canada's treatment of first nations and Inuit peoples is the very illustrative of a racist and discriminatory system against indigenous peoples.

source: D'après mon collègue, les libéraux n'ont-ils pas fait de l'aveuglement volontaire dans ce dossier des allégations de nature sexuelle?
reference: In my colleague's view, did the Liberals not deliberately turn a blind eye in this file on allegations of sexual misconduct?
mt: In my colleague's opinion, did the Liberals not wilfully ignore allegations of a sexual nature in this matter?

source: Par contre, le 19 octobre 2015, lors des élections fédérales, nos chemins ont pris des tangentes différentes: j'ai choisi de me présenter sous la bannière du Parti conservateur; le ministre de la Défense a choisi de se présenter sous celle du Parti libéral.
reference: However, on October 19, 2015, in the federal election, we chose two different paths. I chose to run as a Conservative Party candidate, while the Minister of National Defence chose to run for the Liberal Party.
mt: However, on October 19, 2015, during the federal election, our paths went down a different path: I chose to run for the Conservative Party; the Minister of National Defence chose to run for the Liberal Party.

source: Rappelons-nous ce que représente le Parti libéral du Canada pour les Forces canadiennes.
reference: Let me remind members what the Liberal Party represents for the Canadian Forces.
mt: Let us remember what the Liberal Party of Canada represents for the Canadian Forces.

source: Nos forces armées et notre aviation étaient en Irak et en Syrie pour combattre l'ennemi, le groupe État islamique.
reference: Our armed forces and our air force were in Iraq and Syria fighting the enemy, ISIS.
mt: Our armed forces and our air force were in Iraq and Syria to fight the enemy, ISIS.

source: Lorsque nous l'avons questionné abondamment sur les raisons derrière le retrait des CF‑18, le ministre nous a mentionné que l'Irak était d'accord.
reference: When we questioned him at length about the reasons behind the decision to pull our CF-18s out, the minister said that Iraq had agreed to it.
mt: When we asked him a lot about the reasons behind the withdrawal of the CF-18s, the minister told us that Iraq agreed.

source: L'Irak était très déçu de la décision du Canada.
reference: Iraq was very disappointed with Canada's decision.
mt: Iraq was very disappointed with Canada's decision.

source: L'ombudsman était complètement démonté.
reference: The ombudsman was completely taken aback.
mt: The ombudsman was completely dismayed.

source: À l'époque où ils étaient au pouvoir, les conservateurs avaient commandé un rapport à la juge Marie Deschamps.
reference: When the Conservatives were in power, they commissioned a report from Justice Marie Deschamps.
mt: When they were in power, the Conservatives commissioned a report from Justice Marie Deschamps.

source: Est-ce encore une fois parce qu'il avait été commandé par les conservateurs?
reference: Was it because, again, the report had been commissioned by the Conservatives?
mt: Is it again because it was commissioned by the Conservatives?

source: Cela a pris à peu près deux ans aux conservateurs pour réagir, parce qu'ils étaient eux-mêmes au courant qu'ils avaient mandaté cet homme, de façon légitime, par l'entremise du Parlement, où nous siégeons actuellement.
reference: It took the Conservatives about two years to react because they themselves knew that they had given him a legitimate mandate through Parliament, where we now sit.
mt: It took the Conservatives about two years to react, because they themselves knew that they had legitimately elected this man through the Parliament we are currently sitting on.

source: Je comprends que le fait d'être visé par une motion des conservateurs puisse lui faire éprouver de l'amertume, puisque ces derniers ont quand même été les champions des compressions relativement à la Défense et aux anciens combattants.
reference: I understand that he might be feeling bitter about being the subject of a Conservative motion, since the Conservatives are the ones who made all kinds of cuts to defence and veterans affairs.
mt: I understand that being targeted by a Conservative motion may cause him to feel bitter, since they were still the champions of cuts to defence and veterans.

source: C'est avec beaucoup d'agacement que je prends la parole aujourd'hui concernant la motion présentée dans le cadre de cette journée de l'opposition du Parti conservateur:
reference: It is with great frustration that I rise today to speak to the motion that was introduced on this Conservative Party opposition day:
mt: It is with great aggravation that I rise today to speak to the Conservative Party's opposition day motion:

source: Que, étant donné que le ministre de la Défense nationale a manifestement perdu le respect des membres des Forces armées canadiennes, y compris parmi les plus hauts gradés, pour avoir, entre autres, (i) induit les Canadiens en erreur relativement au retrait des avions de combat dans la lutte contre Daech, (ii) induit les Canadiens en erreur relativement à ses états de service, (iii) présidé à la mise en accusation injustifiée et au congédiement abusif du vice-amiral Norman, (iv) participé à la dissimulation d'allégations d'inconduite sexuelle dans les Forces armées canadiennes, la Chambre blâme officiellement le ministre de la Défense nationale pour exprimer la déception de la Chambre des communes à l'égard de sa conduite.
reference: That, given that the Minister of National Defence has clearly lost the respect of members of the Canadian Armed Forces, including those at the highest ranks, for, amongst other things, (i) misleading Canadians on the withdrawal of fighter jets in the fight against ISIS, (ii) misleading Canadians about his service record, (iii) presiding over the wrongful accusation and dismissal of Vice-Admiral Norman, (iv) engaging in a cover-up of sexual misconduct allegations in the Canadian Armed Forces, the House formally censure the Minister of National Defence to express the disappointment of the House of Commons in his conduct.
mt: That, given that the Minister of National Defence has clearly lost respect for members of the Canadian Armed Forces, including some of the highest officers, for having, among other things, (i) misled Canadians on the withdrawal of fighter jets from the fight against Daesh, (ii) misled Canadians on his service record, (iii) presided over the unjustified charge and improper dismissal of Vice-Admiral Norman, (iv) participated in the concealment of allegations of sexual misconduct in the Canadian Armed Forces, the House formally blame the Minister of National Defence for expressing the House of Commons’s disappointment in his conduct.

source: Un blâme, tel que proposé par la motion, n'écarte toutefois pas ce ministre, qui n'a pas pris au sérieux les allégations d'inconduites sexuelles dans les Forces armées canadiennes.
reference: The censure proposed by the motion does not get rid of this minister, who did not take sexual misconduct allegations in the Canadian Armed Forces seriously.
mt: A blame, as proposed in the motion, does not rule out this minister, who did not take allegations of sexual misconduct in the Canadian Armed Forces seriously.

source: Je vais tout de même prendre le temps de souligner que les allégations ne datent pas d'hier et qu'elles avaient même débuté sous le gouvernement conservateur, puisque c'est en avril 2015 que Jonathan Vance a été désigné comme futur chef d'état‑major de la Défense.
reference: I will nevertheless take the time to point out that these allegations are not new, and that they began under the Conservative government, since it was in April 2015 that Jonathan Vance was named as the future chief of the defence staff.
mt: Nevertheless, I will take the time to point out that the allegations are not new and that they even started under the Conservative government, since Jonathan Vance was designated as the future chief of the defence staff in April 2015.

source: Peu avant sa désignation, des allégations d'inconduite sexuelle avaient été soulevées contre lui.
reference: Allegations of sexual misconduct had been raised against him shortly before his appointment.
mt: Shortly before he was designated, allegations of sexual misconduct were raised against him.

source: Comment est-ce donc possible que le général Vance, pourtant visé par des allégations très graves, ait été désigné, considérant son rôle et son mandat à titre de chef d'état‑major, comme responsable pour donner un coup de barre contre l'inconduite sexuelle?
reference: How is it possible that General Vance, who was the subject of very serious allegations, was appointed, given his role and his mandate as chief of the defence staff, as the person in charge of doing something against sexual misconduct?
mt: How is it possible that General Vance, who is facing very serious allegations, was designated, given his role and his mandate as chief of the defence staff, as responsible for setting a course against sexual misconduct?

source: Bref, les conservateurs ont quand même décidé de nommer quelqu'un qui faisait l'objet d'accusations comme patron des Forces armées canadiennes, alors qu'ils savaient que le mandat de celui-ci consistait à s'attaquer à la conduite sexiste des forces.
reference: In short, the Conservatives decided to appoint someone against whom accusations had been made when he was the boss of the Canadian Armed Forces, when they knew that his mandate would be to address sexual misconduct in the forces.
mt: In short, the Conservatives still decided to appoint someone who was facing charges as the head of the Canadian Armed Forces, even though they knew that his mandate was to attack the sexist conduct of the forces.

source: Rappelons maintenant quelques allégations sous le gouvernement libéral.
reference: Now let us look at some of the allegations under the Liberal government.
mt: Let us now recall some allegations under the Liberal government.

source: Le 1<Sup>er</Sup> mars 2018, l'ombudsman Gary Walbourne a eu une rencontre privée avec le <Affiliation DbId="214311" Type="4">ministre de la Défense nationale</Affiliation>.
reference: On March 1, 2018, then ombudsman Gary Walbourne met privately with the <Affiliation DbId="214311" Type="4">Minister of National Defence</Affiliation>.
mt: On March 1, 2018, ombudsman Gary Walbourne had a private meeting with the <Affiliation DbId="214311" Type="4"> Minister of National Defence</Affiliation> .

source: La victime ne voulait pas aller plus loin dans le processus, puisqu'elle avait peur des représailles, ce qui liait les mains de l'ombudsman.
reference: The victim did not want to go any further in the process because she was afraid of reprisals, preventing the ombudsman from going forward.
mt: The victim did not want to go any further because she was afraid of reprisals, which ties the ombudsman's hands.

source: Toutefois, l'ombudsman, qui avait entre les mains des preuves crédibles contre Vance, voulait les montrer au ministre qui a carrément refusé de les voir.
reference: However, the ombudsman, who had credible evidence against Vance, wanted to show it to the minister, who categorically refused to even look at it.
mt: However, the ombudsman, who had credible evidence against Vance, wanted to show it to the minister, who flatly refused to see it.

source: Le ministre a plutôt transmis le cas au Bureau du Conseil privé.
reference: The minister then referred the case to the Privy Council Office.
mt: Instead, the minister referred the case to the Privy Council Office.

source: Le Bureau du premier ministre et le Bureau du Conseil privé ont échangé des courriels pour parler de la situation.
reference: The Prime Minister's Office and the Privy Council Office exchanged emails about the situation.
mt: The Prime Minister's Office and the Privy Council Office exchanged emails to talk about the situation.

source: Le Comité permanent de la défense a donc choisi d'entreprendre une étude sur les allégations contre Vance.
reference: The standing committee on national defence decided to investigate the allegations against Vance.
mt: The Standing Committee on Defence therefore chose to undertake a study on the allegations against Vance.

source: Les libéraux ont choisi de ne rien voir dans ce dossier, avec le ministre qui a carrément refusé de rencontrer l'ancien ombudsman à 12 reprises, qui a refusé de regarder les preuves, prétextant de ne pas vouloir s'ingérer dans l'enquête.
reference: The Liberals decided to ignore the issue, while the minister flatly refused to meet with the former ombudsman 12 times and would not even look at the evidence, claiming he did not want to interfere in the investigation.
mt: The Liberals chose not to see anything on this file, with the minister who flatly refused to meet with the former ombudsman 12 times, who refused to look at the evidence, claiming that he did not want to interfere in the investigation.

source: Tout le monde autour de lui se doutait que ces allégations concernaient des cas d'inconduite sexuelle.
reference: Everyone around him suspected that these allegations involved sexual misconduct.
mt: Everyone around him suspected that these allegations involved sexual misconduct.

source: C'est lorsqu'il a été acculé au mur qu'il a décidé de commencer à agir, uniquement pour sauver sa peau à la suite des pressions des partis de l'opposition à la Chambre et des travaux aux deux comités.
reference: Only when he had his back to the wall did he decide to do something, but only to save his own skin, after pressure from the opposition parties in the House and the committee investigations.
mt: It was when he was backed into a corner that he decided to start to act, only to save his own skin after pressure from the opposition parties in the House and work on both committees.

source: En terminant, les libéraux prétendent qu'ils ne connaissent pas la nature des allégations contre Vance, le ministre de la Défense allant même jusqu'à dire que la nature des allégations n'a pas d'importance.
reference: In closing, the Liberals claim that they are unaware of the nature of the allegations against Vance, with the Minister of Defence even saying that the nature of the allegations does not matter.
mt: In closing, the Liberals claim that they do not know the nature of the allegations against Vance, the defence minister even goes so far as to say that the nature of the allegations does not matter.

source: N'a‑t‑elle pas l'impression que les libéraux et les conservateurs sont dans le même sac et qu'ils ne se soucient pas du sort des victimes?
reference: Does she not get the feeling that the Liberals and the Conservatives are very alike in that they do not care about what happens to the victims?
mt: Does she not feel that the Liberals and the Conservatives are in the same bag and that they do not care about victims?

source: Les conservateurs ont fait la même chose dans le cas du général Vance: ils ont nié qu'il y avait eu des allégations de nature sexuelle.
reference: The Conservatives did the same thing in the case of General Vance: They denied that there had been any allegations of a sexual nature.
mt: The Conservatives did the same thing with General Vance: they denied that there had been allegations of a sexual nature.

source: Comment se fait‑il qu'il maintienne en poste un ministre de la Défense qui a toléré de telles allégations?
reference: How can it possibly allow a defence minister who tolerated such allegations to keep his job?
mt: How is it that he is keeping a defence minister who has tolerated such allegations?

source: Nous discutons aujourd'hui de la motion qui a été déposée par le Parti conservateur et qui se lit comme suit:
reference: Today, we are discussing a motion moved by the Conservative Party, which reads as follows:
mt: Today we are discussing the motion moved by the Conservative Party, which reads as follows:

source: (iv) participé à la dissimulation d’allégations d’inconduite sexuelle dans les Forces armées canadiennes,
reference: (iv) engaging in a cover-up of sexual misconduct allegations in the Canadian Armed Forces,
mt: (iv) participated in the concealment of allegations of sexual misconduct in the Canadian Armed Forces,

source: Peu de temps après, on a aussi appris que le remplaçant du général Vance, l'amiral McDonald, a dû lui aussi quitter ses fonctions, étant également ciblé par des allégations d'inconduite sexuelle.
reference: Shortly thereafter we also learned that General Vance's replacement, Admiral McDonald, also had to step down, also because of allegations of sexual misconduct.
mt: Shortly thereafter, we also learned that General Vance's replacement, Admiral McDonald, had to step down as well. He was also targeted by allegations of sexual misconduct.

source: On voit donc que cette situation perdure aux plus hauts échelons de l'armée et devient préoccupante, puisque le ministre actuel de la Défense nationale a été avisé du problème par Gary Walbourne, qui était à l'époque ombudsman de la Défense nationale et des Forces armées canadiennes, mais qui a pris sa retraite depuis.
reference: This has been going on at the upper echelons of the military for some time and it is troubling since the current Minister of National Defence was notified of the problem by Gary Walbourne, who was national defence and armed forces ombudsman at the time, but has since retired.
mt: This situation continues at the highest levels of the military and is of concern, since the current Minister of National Defence was notified of the problem by Gary Walbourne, who was then the National Defence and Canadian Armed Forces Ombudsman but has since retired.

source: Ce dernier est allé rencontrer le ministre pour l'aviser d'une plainte importante visant le chef d'état-major de la Défense, le général Vance.
reference: He went to the minister to advise him of a major complaint against the chief of the defence staff, General Vance.
mt: He went to meet with the minister to advise him of an important complaint against the Chief of the Defence Staff, General Vance.

source: En fait, le ministre a refusé de regarder ce que l'ombudsman voulait lui montrer et il a par la suite refusé toute nouvelle rencontre avec ce dernier.
reference: In fact, the minister refused to look at what the ombudsman wanted to show him and then refused to meet with him again thereafter.
mt: In fact, the minister refused to look at what the ombudsman wanted to show him and then refused any new meetings with him.

source: Pourtant, c'est complètement faux, car on a fini par apprendre qu'il était au courant, puisqu'il avait rencontré l'ombudsman, qui voulait lui en parler.
reference: That is completely untrue, however, because we have now learned that he was aware. He met with the ombudsman, who wanted to talk to him about the situation.
mt: However, that is completely false, because we finally learned that he knew about it, since he met with the ombudsman, who wanted to talk to him about it.

source: Pourtant, on a demandé à l'ancien ombudsman si cela aurait constitué de l'ingérence que de le rencontrer pour prendre connaissance des preuves.
reference: Nevertheless, we asked the former ombudsman if it would have constituted interference to meet with him to look at the evidence.
mt: However, the former ombudsman was asked if it would have been interference to meet with him to see the evidence.

source: On a demandé au Service national des enquêtes des Forces canadiennes si cela aurait constitué de l'ingérence que le ministre fasse son travail, c'est-à-dire qu'il regarde tout simplement les preuves et qu'il accepte de rencontrer l'ombudsman.
reference: We asked the Canadian Forces National Investigation Service or CFNIS if it would have constituted interference for the minister to do his job by simply looking at the evidence and agreeing to meet with the ombudsman.
mt: The Canadian Forces National Investigation Service was asked if it would have been interference for the minister to do his job, which is to simply look at the evidence and agree to meet with the ombudsman.

source: La cheffe de cabinet du premier ministre aurait été aussi informée de la situation.
reference: The Prime Minister's chief of staff was also informed of the situation.
mt: The Prime Minister's chief of staff would also have been informed of the situation.

source: Il n'a pas fait son travail, et à cause de cela, pour le protéger et pour empêcher les choses de fonctionner, le Parti libéral fait de l'obstruction systématique.
reference: He did not do his job, and, because of that, to protect itself and to prevent things from going smoothly, the Liberal Party has been systematically obstructing the investigation.
mt: It did not do its job, and because of that, to protect it and to prevent it from functioning, the Liberal Party is filibustering.

source: Par contre, ce sont les libéraux qui n'ont pas agi quand il y a eu les allégations à son égard.
reference: However, the Liberals are the ones who failed to act when allegations about him surfaced.
mt: However, it was the Liberals who did not act when there were allegations against him.

source: Néanmoins, on doit en comprendre que s'il fallait aller plus loin, si des choses étaient décevantes dans l'action des conservateurs, je pense que cela mériterait tout à fait que le même genre de traitement soit fait, c'est-à-dire qu'on enquête sur cela, à condition qu'il n'y ait pas d'obstruction extrême en comité pour empêcher qu'on fasse la lumière sur ces affaires.
reference: Nevertheless, if there was a need to delve further, if the Conservatives failed to act, I think that the same steps should be taken, that is, that their conduct should be investigated as long as there would not be filibustering at committee to prevent light being shed on these matters.
mt: Nevertheless, we have to understand that if we had to go further, if things were disappointing in the Conservatives' actions, I think that it would be entirely worthy of the same kind of treatment, that is, that we investigate this matter, as long as there is no extreme obstruction in committee to prevent us from getting to the bottom of these matters.

source: Il se dit déçu de voir s'allier les bloquistes et les conservateurs pour, disons, avoir la tête du <Affiliation DbId="214311" Type="4">ministre de la Défense</Affiliation>.
reference: He said he was disappointed to see the Bloc and the Conservatives joining forces in calling for the <Affiliation DbId="214311" Type="4">defence minister</Affiliation>'s head, shall we say.
mt: He said that he was disappointed to see the Bloc and the Conservatives assembled so that, let us say, he could have the head of the <Affiliation DbId="214311" Type="4"> Minister of National Defence</Affiliation> .

source: Madame la Présidente, cet après-midi, à Montréal, la population se rassemblait à l'invitation d'Amnistie internationale pour exiger encore une fois la libération de Raïf Badawi.
reference: Madam Speaker, this afternoon in Montreal, people gathered at the urging of Amnesty International to once again demand the release of Raïf Badawi.
mt: Madam Speaker, this afternoon in Montreal, the public gathered at Amnesty International to once again demand the release of Raif Badawi.

source: Pourquoi le Parti libéral continue‑t‑il de s'y opposer?
reference: Why does the Liberal Party continue to oppose that?
mt: Why does the Liberal Party continue to oppose it?

source: Monsieur le Président, je me permets de dire ce qu'est la plus grande menace pour la reprise économique du Canada aujourd'hui: le jeu partisan des conservateurs.
reference: Mr. Speaker, I want to say that the biggest threat to Canada's economic recovery is the Conservatives' partisan games.
mt: Mr. Speaker, let me say what the greatest threat to Canada's economic recovery today is: the Conservatives' partisan game.

source: Les tactiques des conservateurs nous empêchent d'adopter le budget et ce comportement irresponsable menace le bien-être de chaque Canadien ou Canadienne.
reference: The Conservatives' tactics are preventing us from passing the budget, and this irresponsible behaviour is jeopardizing the well-being of each and every Canadian.
mt: The Conservatives' tactics prevent us from passing the budget and this irresponsible behaviour threatens the well-being of every Canadian.

source: Monsieur le Président, nous comprenons et je comprends extrêmement bien la menace sévère que posent les tactiques des conservateurs.
reference: Mr. Speaker, we understand and I understand very well the serious threat posed by the Conservatives' tactics.
mt: Mr. Speaker, we understand and I fully understand the serious threat posed by the Conservatives' tactics.

source: Pour y parvenir, cependant, nos entreprises et nos citoyens ont besoin de l'appui de notre budget.
reference: To do so, however, Canadians and Canadian businesses need the support of our budget.
mt: However, to do that, our businesses and our citizens need the support of our budget.

source: Ce sont les conservateurs qui nous empêchent d'appuyer les Canadiens et ils doivent arrêter de faire ça.
reference: It is the Conservatives who are preventing us from supporting Canadians, and they need to stop.
mt: It is the Conservatives who are preventing us from supporting Canadians, and they need to stop doing that.

source: Il sait très bien que nous sommes un gouvernement minoritaire et que tout projet de loi nécessite l'appui des partis de l'opposition.
reference: He knows full well that we are a minority government and that every bill needs the support of the opposition parties.
mt: He knows full well that we are a minority government and that any bill requires the support of the opposition parties.

source: Puisque le Parti conservateur réclame depuis des années la modernisation de la Loi sur les langues officielles, et puisque le gouvernement a déposé un projet de loi sur la modernisation de la Loi sur les langues officielles, ma question pour lui est la suivante: le Parti conservateur va‑t‑il appuyer notre projet de loi, oui ou non?
reference: Given that the Conservative Party has been calling for the modernization of the Official Languages Act for years, and given that the government has now introduced a bill to modernize the Official Languages Act, my question for him is this: Will the Conservative Party support our bill, yes or no?
mt: Since the Conservative Party has been calling for the modernization of the Official Languages Act for years, and since the government introduced a bill to modernize the Official Languages Act, my question for the Conservative Party is this: will the Conservative Party support our bill, yes or no?

source: André, en mon nom et au nom de tous ceux qui ont eu l'honneur de servir la Chambre au fauteuil, des députés et des employés de l'Administration de la Chambre des communes, je tiens à vous remercier pour votre contribution au service de notre institution.
reference: André, on behalf of myself, all those who have had the honour of serving the House in the chair, MPs and employees of the House of Commons administration, I would like to thank you for your contributions to our institution.
mt: André, on my behalf and on behalf of all those who have had the honour of serving the House in the chair, members and employees of the House of Commons administration, I would like to thank you for your contribution to the service of this institution.
terms: Administration de la Chambre des communes

source: Demain, nous reprenons le débat à l'étape du rapport du même projet de loi, soit le projet de loi <Document DbId="11283337" Type="3">C‑30, Loi no 1 d'exécution du budget de 2021</Document>.
reference: Tomorrow we will resume debate at report stage of the same bill, Bill <Document DbId="11283337" Type="3">C‑30, budget implementation act, 2021, no. 1</Document>.
mt: Tomorrow, we will resume debate at report stage of the same bill, Bill <Document DbId="11283337" Type="3"> C-30, Budget Implementation Act, 2021, No. 1</Document> .

source: Madame la Présidente, il y a quelques semaines, le <Affiliation DbId="214311" Type="4">ministre de la Défense nationale</Affiliation> a affirmé que la nature des allégations contre le général Vance n'avait pas d'importance et que ce qui comptait, ce sont les mesures prises.
reference: Madam Speaker, a few weeks ago, the <Affiliation DbId="214311" Type="4">Minister of National Defence</Affiliation> stated that the nature of the allegations against General Vance was unimportant and that what mattered was the steps taken.
mt: Madam Speaker, a few weeks ago, the <Affiliation DbId="214311" Type="4"> Minister of National Defence</Affiliation> said that the nature of the allegations against General Vance did not matter and that what matters is action.

source: Nous, les partis de l'opposition, voyons ces signes.
reference: We, the opposition parties, certainly can.
mt: We, the opposition parties, see these signs.

source: Quand nous avons appuyé les libéraux relativement au projet de loi <Document DbId="10926636" Type="3">C‑10</Document>, les conservateurs disaient que nous avions le même discours que les libéraux.
reference: When we supported the Liberals on Bill <Document DbId="10926636" Type="3">C‑10</Document>, the Conservatives said we sounded just like the Liberals.
mt: When we supported the Liberals on Bill <Document DbId="10926636" Type="3"> C-10</Document> , the Conservatives said that we had the same speech as the Liberals.

source: Maintenant que nous appuyons cette motion des conservateurs, les libéraux disent que nous tenons le même discours que les conservateurs.
reference: Now that we are supporting this Conservative motion, the Liberals say we sound just like the Conservatives.
mt: Now that we support this Conservative motion, the Liberals are saying that we are saying the same thing as the Conservatives.

source: Le gouvernement sait qu'il n'y a qu'une chose à faire, et les partis de l'opposition sont d'accord.
reference: The government knows that there is only one thing to do, and the opposition parties agree.
mt: The government knows that there is only one thing to do, and the opposition parties agree.

source: Si un député d'un parti reconnu présent en Chambre désire demander un vote par appel nominal ou que la motion soit adoptée avec dissidence, je l'invite à se lever et à l'indiquer à la présidence.
reference: If a member of a recognized party present in the House wishes to request a recorded division or that the motion be adopted on division, I would invite them to rise and indicate it to the Chair.
mt: If a member of a recognized party present in the House wishes to request a recorded division or that the motion be adopted on division, I invite them to rise and indicate it to the Chair.

source: Comme on le sait, le 25 février dernier, l'honorable <Affiliation DbId="253377" Type="4">ministre des Aînés</Affiliation> a déposé au nom du <Affiliation DbId="253369" Type="4">président du Conseil du Trésor</Affiliation> les plans ministériels annuels et le Budget principal des dépenses 2021-2022.
reference: As members know, on February 25, the hon. <Affiliation DbId="253377" Type="4">Minister of Seniors</Affiliation> tabled, on behalf of the <Affiliation DbId="253369" Type="4">President of the Treasury Board</Affiliation>, the annual departmental plans and the main estimates, 2021-22.
mt: As we know, on February 25, the hon. <Affiliation DbId="253377" Type="4"> Minister of Seniors</Affiliation> tabled annual departmental plans and the main estimates 2021-22 on behalf of the <Affiliation DbId="253369" Type="4"> President of the Treasury Board</Affiliation> .

source: Comme nous le savons tous, lorsque la pandémie de la COVID‑19 a frappé, elle a plongé notre pays dans la plus grave récession depuis la Grande Crise, entraînant la fermeture de dizaines de milliers d'entreprises et la perte d'emplois et de revenus dans tout le pays.
reference: As we all know, when the COVID‑19 pandemic hit, it plunged our country into our worst recession since the Great Depression. Tens of thousands of businesses closed down, and jobs and incomes were lost all across the country.
mt: As we all know, when the COVID-19 pandemic hit, it plunged our country into the worst recession since the Great Depression, leading to the closure of tens of thousands of businesses and the loss of jobs and income across the country.

source: Les dépenses législatives ont déjà été autorisées par des lois existantes, comme la Loi sur les mesures d'urgence visant la COVID‑19 ou la Loi sur les prestations canadiennes de relance économique, et sont donc présentées dans le budget principal des dépenses à titre d'information seulement.
reference: Statutory expenditures have already been authorized in existing legislation, such as the COVID‑19 Emergency Response Act and the Canada Recovery Benefits Act, so they are presented in the budget for information only.
mt: Legislative expenditures have already been authorized by existing legislation, such as the COVID-19 Emergency Response Act or the Canada Recovery Benefits Act, and are therefore presented in the main estimates as information only.

source: Enfin, le Budget principal des dépenses du Secrétariat prévoit également une augmentation nette de 27 millions de dollars pour les dépenses de programme.
reference: Finally, the main estimates of the Treasury Board Secretariat also include a net increase of $27 million for program spending.
mt: Finally, the secretariat's main estimates also include a net increase of $27 million in program spending.

source: Elle travaille, par exemple, avec les provinces et les territoires, les Premières Nations et les secteurs privé et sans but lucratif pour améliorer l'accès à des logements abordables.
reference: For example, it works with the provinces and territories, first nations, as well as the private and non-profit sectors to improve access to affordable housing.
mt: For example, she is working with the provinces and territories, first nations, and the private and non-profit sectors to improve access to affordable housing.

source: Pour ce qui est du budget des dépenses, nous fournissons des rapports parallèles, avec une liste détaillée des autorisations législatives et une annexe en ligne sur les dépenses prévues liées à la pandémie.
reference: As for the estimates, we are providing side reports, with a detailed list of statutory authorities and an online annex on estimated pandemic-related expenditures.
mt: With regard to the estimates, we are providing parallel reports, with a detailed list of statutory authorities and an online schedule on planned pandemic spending.

source: Depuis quelques années, le gouvernement dépose le Budget principal des dépenses et les plans ministériels à peu près en même temps.
reference: In recent years, the government has tabled the main estimates and the departmental plans at about the same time.
mt: Over the past few years, the government has tabled the main estimates and departmental plans pretty much at the same time.

source: Les plans ministériels montrent comment chaque ministère prévoit atteindre les résultats et fournissent des détails supplémentaires sur les ressources demandées dans le Budget principal des dépenses.
reference: The departmental plans show how each department plans to achieve results and provide further details on the resources requested in the main estimates.
mt: Ministerial plans show how each department plans to achieve results and provide additional details on the resources requested in the main estimates.

source: Le Budget principal des dépenses témoigne de l'engagement du gouvernement à relever ces défis, tout en continuant à travailler sur d'autres priorités nationales.
reference: The main estimates attest to the government's commitment to address these challenges while continuing to work on other national priorities.
mt: The main estimates reflect our government's commitment to addressing these challenges while continuing to work on other national priorities.

source: Madame la Présidente, j'ai écouté mon collègue de Hull—Aylmer et sa présentation sur le budget des dépenses avec beaucoup d'attention.
reference: Madam Speaker, I listened very attentively to my colleague from Hull—Aylmer and to his presentation on the main estimates.
mt: Madam Speaker, I listened carefully to my colleague from Hull—Aylmer and his presentation on the estimates.

source: La raison pour laquelle je voulais présenter à mes chers collègues aujourd'hui un survol de ces dépenses du gouvernement, c'est qu'il est certain que la présentation du prochain secrétaire parlementaire ou ministre va traiter précisément du budget du ministère des Transports.
reference: The reason I wanted to present an overview of this government spending to my hon. colleagues today is that the presentation by the next parliamentary secretary or minister will certainly deal specifically with the budget for the Department of Transport.
mt: The reason I wanted to give my dear colleagues an overview of the government's spending today is that it is certain that the presentation by the next parliamentary secretary or minister will deal specifically with the budget of the Department of Transport.

source: Le gouvernement a déjà annoncé dans le dernier budget des éléments qui vont dans le sens de la quatrième mesure, qui va comme suit:
reference: Some of the measures the government announced in its latest budget are consistent with the fourth measure, which reads as follows:
mt: The government has already announced measures in the last budget that support the fourth measure, which reads as follows:

source: Le budget comporte deux bonnes nouvelles à ce sujet-ci.
reference: There are two pieces of good news in this budget.
mt: There are two good news in the budget on this.

source: Qu'est-ce qui surprend le plus mon collègue en regardant les sommes monstrueuses que tant les conservateurs que les libéraux ont laissé s'échapper dans les paradis fiscaux chaque année?
reference: What surprises my colleague the most about the astronomical amounts that both the Conservatives and the Liberals have lost to tax havens every year?
mt: What surprises my colleague the most when he looks at the monstrous amounts that both the Conservatives and the Liberals have allowed to slip into tax havens every year?

source: J'ai vraiment beaucoup de choses à dire sur le budget principal des dépenses et sur le budget supplémentaire des dépenses.
reference: I really have a lot to say about the main estimates and the supplementary estimates.
mt: I really have a lot to say about the main estimates and the supplementary estimates.

source: Je ne peux pas me lever à la Chambre et parler de dépenses et de budget sans parler de cette injustice.
reference: I simply cannot rise in the House to talk about expenditures and budgets without talking about that injustice.
mt: I cannot stand in the House and talk about spending and the budget without talking about this injustice.

source: Les provinces demandent à l'unanimité 28 milliards de dollars, mais ce n'est pas dans le budget.
reference: The provinces are unanimous in their demand for $28 billion, but that is not in the budget.
mt: The provinces are unanimously asking for $28 billion, but it is not in the budget.

source: Comment est-on capable, sans être gêné, de voter un budget qui, à près de 400 milliards de dollars de déficit, n'améliore pas la qualité de vie de ceux et celles qui ont construit notre société?
reference: How could anyone possibly sleep at night after voting for a budget that, with a deficit of nearly $400 billion, does not improve the quality of life of those who built our society?
mt: How can we, without being embarrassed, vote on a budget that, with nearly $400 billion in deficit, does not improve the quality of life of those who built our society?

source: Dans cette mise en œuvre du budget, on souhaite ramener des dépenses.
reference: In this budget implementation case we want to pull back spending.
mt: In implementing the budget, the government wants to bring back spending.

source: Heureusement, mon député préféré, qui a pris la parole avant moi, a été très habile en comité et a réussi à réduire le budget.
reference: Fortunately, my favourite MP, who spoke before me, was very effective in committee and managed to reduce the funding.
mt: Fortunately, my favourite member, who spoke before me, was very good at committee and managed to reduce the budget.

source: Dans la mise en œuvre du budget, une disposition dit que les compagnies qui ont bénéficié de la Subvention salariale d'urgence du Canada ne peuvent pas verser de primes à leurs hauts salariés.
reference: A provision in the budget implementation bill states that companies that received the Canada emergency wage subsidy may not pay bonuses to their senior executives.
mt: In the implementation of the budget, there is a provision that says that companies that received the Canada emergency wage subsidy cannot pay bonuses to their high wage earners.

source: Dans le budget, les libéraux ont prévu 17,6 milliards pour ce qu'ils ont l'odieux d'appeler une relance verte alors que, depuis le début de la pandémie, ils ont donné 18 milliards de dollars aux pétrolières.
reference: In the budget, the Liberals earmarked $17.6 billion for what they have the nerve to call a green recovery when, from the start of the pandemic, they have given $18 billion to oil companies.
mt: In the budget, the Liberals budgeted $17.6 billion for what they have the audacity to call a green recovery, while they have given $18 billion to the oil companies since the beginning of the pandemic.

source: Nous avons demandé à plusieurs reprises que le directeur parlementaire du budget nous donne une estimation, non seulement de l'augmentation des coûts de construction de cet oléoduc, mais aussi de son manque de viabilité.
reference: We have asked the Parliamentary Budget Officer several times to give us an assessment of the increased construction costs for this pipeline, as well as its lack of viability.
mt: We have repeatedly asked the Parliamentary Budget Officer to give us an estimate, not only of the increased cost of building this pipeline, but also of its lack of sustainability.

source: Le directeur parlementaire du budget a dit qu'il n'y avait aucune façon pour le gouvernement de tirer profit de cet oléoduc, lequel va continuer à engloutir l'argent des contribuables pendant des années.
reference: The Parliamentary Budget Officer said that the government would never turn a profit on this pipeline, which will continue to swallow up taxpayers' money for years to come.
mt: The Parliamentary Budget Officer said that there was no way for the government to take advantage of this pipeline, which will continue to spend taxpayers' money for years to come.

source: Monsieur le Président, le 9 juin, un avis d'opposition a été donné en ce qui concerne le crédit 1 — Dépenses de fonctionnement, du budget principal des dépenses, sous la rubrique ministère des Transports, au montant de 741 693 237 $, par la députée de <Affiliation DbId="252807" Type="2">Calgary Midnapore</Affiliation>.
reference: Mr. Speaker, on June 9, the member for <Affiliation DbId="252807" Type="2">Calgary Midnapore</Affiliation> submitted a notice of opposition regarding Vote 1, “Operating expenditures”, in the main estimates, under Department of Transport, in the amount of $741,693,237.
mt: Mr. Speaker, on June 9, a notice of opposition was given regarding vote 1—Operating expenditures, in the main estimates, under the Department of Transport, for the amount of $741,693,237, by the member for <Affiliation DbId="252807" Type="2"> Calgary Midnapore</Affiliation> .

source: Pour protester contre ces primes, la députée propose de supprimer 7 millions de dollars dans le budget de Transports Canada.
reference: To protest those bonuses, the member is suggesting that $7 million be cut from the Transport Canada budget.
mt: To protest these bonuses, the member is proposing to cut $7 million from Transport Canada's budget.

source: Une diminution de 7 millions de dollars du financement du budget principal des dépenses de Transport Canada pour 2021‑2022 réduirait considérablement sa capacité à respecter ses engagements.
reference: A $7‑million reduction to Transport Canada's main estimates funding for 2021-22 would significantly reduce its ability to deliver on its commitments.
mt: A $7 million cut to Transport Canada's main estimates for 2021-22 would significantly reduce Transport Canada's ability to meet its commitments.

source: NAV CANADA ne fait pas partie du budget principal du <Affiliation DbId="271245" Type="4">ministre des Transports</Affiliation>.
reference: Nav Canada is not part of the <Affiliation DbId="271245" Type="4">Minister of Transport</Affiliation>'s main estimates.
mt: Nav Canada is not part of the <Affiliation DbId="271245" Type="4"> Minister of Transport</Affiliation> 's main budget.

source: De plus, les états financiers de NAV CANADA ne sont pas inclus dans le processus du budget principal des dépenses du gouvernement du Canada.
reference: What is more, Nav Canada's financial statements are not included in the Government of Canada's main estimates process.
mt: In addition, Nav Canada's financial statements are not included in the Government of Canada's main estimates process.

source: Le financement de Nav Canada provient essentiellement des frais imposés pour ses services liés à la gestion de plus de 18 millions de kilomètres carrés d'espace aérien.
reference: Nav Canada is primarily funded by the fees it receives for managing more than 18 million square kilometres of airspace.
mt: The funding for Nav Canada is largely due to fees charged for its services related to the management of over 18 million square kilometres of airspace.

source: Les primes de Nav Canada ont donc été versées en dehors de la période citée dans le budget de 2021.
reference: The Nav Canada bonuses were paid outside of the period set out in budget 2021.
mt: As a result, Nav Canada bonuses were paid out outside the period set out in budget 2021.

source: Les fonds utilisés pour payer les primes ne provenaient pas du budget de Transports Canada.
reference: The funds used to pay these bonuses did not come from Transport Canada's budget.
mt: The money used to pay premiums did not come from Transport Canada's budget.

source: J'encourage tous les députés à voter en faveur du crédit 1 — Dépenses de fonctionnement, du budget principal des dépenses, sous la rubrique ministère des Transports, au montant de 741 693 237 $.
reference: I urge all members to vote in favour of Vote 1, “Operating expenditures”, in the main estimates, under Department of Transport, in the amount of $741,693,237.
mt: I encourage all members to vote in favour of vote 1—Operating expenditures, in the main estimates, under the Department of Transport, for the amount of $741,693,237.

source: Le Budget principal des dépenses de 2021-2022
reference: Main Estimates, 2021-22
mt: Main Estimates, 2021-22

source: Que le crédit 1, au montant de 741 693 237 $, sous la rubrique ministère des Transports — Dépenses de fonctionnement, du Budget principal des dépenses pour l'exercice se terminant le 31 mars 2022, soit agréé.
reference: That Vote 1, in the amount of $741,693,237, under Department of Transport — Operating expenditures, in the Main Estimates for the fiscal year ending March 31, 2022, be concurred in.
mt: That Vote 1, in the amount of $741,693,237, under Department of Transport — Operating expenditures, in the Main Estimates for the fiscal year ending March 31, 2022, be concurred in.

source: La prochaine mise aux voix porte sur la motion d'adoption du Budget principal des dépenses.
reference: The next question is on the motion to adopt the main estimates.
mt: The next question is on the motion to concur in the main estimates.

source: Que le Budget principal des dépenses pour l’exercice se terminant le 31 mars 2022, à l'exception de tout crédit adopté plus tôt aujourd'hui et moins les sommes votées au titre des crédits provisoires, soit agréé.
reference: That the Main Estimates for the fiscal year ending March 31, 2022, except any vote disposed of earlier today and less the amounts voted in the interim supply, be concurred in.
mt: That the Main Estimates for the fiscal year ending March 31, 2022, except any vote disposed of earlier today and less the amounts voted in Interim Supply, be concurred in.

source: Si un député d'un parti reconnu présent à la Chambre désire demander un vote par appel nominal ou que la motion soit adoptée avec dissidence, je l'invite à se lever et à l'indiquer à la présidence.
reference: If a member of a recognized party present in the House wishes to request a recorded division or that the motion be adopted on division, I would invite them to rise and indicate it to the Chair.
mt: If a member of a recognized party present in the House wishes to request a recorded division or that the motion be adopted on division, I would invite them to rise and indicate it to the Chair.

source: Si un député d'un parti reconnu présent à la Chambre désire demander un vote par appel nominal ou que la motion soit adoptée avec dissidence, je l'invite à se lever et à l'indiquer à la présidence.
reference: If a member of a recognized party present in the House wishes to request a recorded division or that the motion be adopted on division, I would invite them to rise and indicate it to the Chair.
mt: If a member of a recognized party present in the House wishes to request a recorded division or that the motion be adopted on division, I would invite them to rise and indicate it to the Chair.

source: Si un député d'un parti reconnu présent à la Chambre désire demander un vote par appel nominal ou que la motion soit adoptée avec dissidence, je l'invite à se lever et à l'indiquer à la présidence.
reference: If a member of a recognized party present in the House wishes to request a recorded division or that the motion be adopted on division, I would invite them to rise and indicate it to the Chair.
mt: If a member of a recognized party present in the House wishes to request a recorded division or that the motion be adopted on division, I would invite them to rise and indicate it to the Chair.

source: Le Budget supplémentaire des dépenses (A) 2021‑2022
reference: Supplementary Estimates (A), 2021-22
mt: Supplementary Estimates (A), 2021-22

source: Que le Budget supplémentaire des dépenses (A) pour l'exercice se terminant le 31 mars 2022 soit agréé.
reference: That the Supplementary Estimates (A) for the fiscal year ending March 31, 2022, be concurred in.
mt: That the Supplementary Estimates (A) for the fiscal year ending March 31, 2022, be concurred in.

source: La Chambre reprend l'étude, interrompue le 16 juin, du projet de loi <Document DbId="11283337" Type="3">C‑30, Loi portant exécution de certaines dispositions du budget déposé au Parlement le 19 avril 2021 et mettant en œuvre d'autres mesures</Document>, dont le comité a fait rapport avec des propositions d'amendement, ainsi que de la motion n<Sup>o</Sup> 2.
reference: The House resumed from June 16 consideration of Bill <Document DbId="11283337" Type="3">C‑30, An Act to implement certain provisions of the budget tabled in Parliament on April 19, 2021 and other measures</Document>, as reported (with amendments) from the committee, and of Motion No. 2.
mt: The House resumed from June 16 consideration of Bill <Document DbId="11283337" Type="3"> C-30, An Act to implement certain provisions of the budget tabled in Parliament on April 19, 2021 and other measures</Document> , as reported (with amendments) from the committee, and of Motion No. 2.

source: Il n'y a toujours rien dans le budget de 2021 pour y mettre fin.
reference: There is nothing in budget 2021 to do away with them.
mt: There is still nothing in budget 2021 to put an end to it.

source: Dans le budget de 2021, celui qui sert de tremplin pour la relance économique de l'après-COVID‑19, le gouvernement fédéral n'offre que très peu, pour ne pas dire rien, pour aider les petites entreprises agricoles à avoir un meilleur accès au crédit.
reference: In budget 2021, which serves as a springboard for the post-COVID‑19 economic recovery, the federal government offers little or nothing to help small farms get better access to credit.
mt: In budget 2021, the springboard for the post-COVID-19 economic recovery, the federal government offers very little, if anything, to help small farm businesses get better access to credit.

source: C'est effectivement le gros drame et c'est pour cela que le Bloc québécois a voté contre le budget.
reference: That is indeed the crux of the matter, and that is why the Bloc Québécois voted against the budget.
mt: That is the real tragedy, and that is why the Bloc Québécois voted against the budget.

source: Un des grands absents de ce budget est l'aide aux aînés de 65 à 74 ans.
reference: One of the key things missing from this budget is help for seniors aged 65 to 74.
mt: One of the big things missing from this budget is support for seniors aged 65 to 74.

source: Il faut savoir que la Commission des libérations conditionnelles du Canada agit de manière indépendante et prend des décisions basées sur des critères bien établis.
reference: The Parole Board of Canada operates independently and makes decisions based on well-established criteria.
mt: It is important to note that the Parole Board of Canada acts independently and makes decisions based on well-established criteria.

source: Le gouvernement peut donc soit accepter que cela se produise ou consacrer l'heure à discuter, retardant à la fois ce projet de loi et son propre budget.
reference: The government can either agree to this or spend an hour talking about it, delaying both this bill and its own budget.
mt: The government can either agree to that or spend the time talking about it, delaying this bill and its own budget.

source: Par conséquent, j'aimerais demander le consentement unanime de la Chambre pour déposer la motion suivante: Que, nonobstant tout article du Règlement, ordre spécial ou pratique habituelle de la Chambre, lorsque le débat sur le projet de loi S‑204 prendra fin aujourd'hui, le projet de loi soit réputé lu une deuxième fois et renvoyé à un comité plénier, soit réputé avoir été étudié en comité plénier, soit réputé avoir fait l'objet d'un rapport sans amendement et soit réputé adopté à l'étape du rapport, lu une troisième fois et adopté.
reference: Accordingly, I would like to seek the unanimous consent of the House to move the following motion: That, notwithstanding any standing order, special order or usual practice of the House, at the conclusion of today's debate on Bill S‑204, the bill be deemed to have been read a second time and referred to a committee of the whole, deemed considered in a committee of the whole, deemed reported without amendment, deemed concurred in at report stage and deemed read a third time and passed.
mt: Therefore, I would like to seek the unanimous consent of the House to move the following motion: That, notwithstanding any Standing Order, special order or usual practice of the House, when debate on Bill S-204 ends today, the bill be deemed read a second time and referred to a committee of the whole, deemed considered in committee of the whole, deemed reported without amendment, and deemed concurred in at report stage, deemed read a third time and passed.

source: Madame la Présidente, le sujet du débat d'aujourd'hui est le projet de loi <Document DbId="11283337" Type="3">C‑30</Document>, mais pour le commun des mortels cela ne veut pas dire grand-chose, parce qu'il s'agit d'un projet de loi de mise en œuvre du budget.
reference: Madam Speaker, today we are debating Bill <Document DbId="11283337" Type="3">C‑30</Document>, but that does not mean much to the average person. This is a budget implementation bill.
mt: Madam Speaker, the subject of today's debate is Bill <Document DbId="11283337" Type="3"> C-30</Document> , but for the average person, that does not mean much, because it is a budget implementation bill.

source: C'est intéressant que nous parlions de budget et de projet de loi de mise en œuvre de budget.
reference: It is interesting that we are talking about the budget and the budget implementation bill.
mt: It is interesting that we are talking about the budget and the budget implementation bill.

source: Nous sommes en 2021, et le gouvernement a été élu en 2019, ce qui veut dire que le gouvernement a pris deux ans, voire un peu plus avant de déposer finalement un budget.
reference: It is 2021, and the government was elected in 2019, which means that the government took two years and a bit to finally present a budget.
mt: It is 2021, and the government was elected in 2019, which means that it took the government two years, if not a little longer, to finally table a budget.

source: On a l'impression que le gouvernement a profité de cette situation pour ne pas déposer de budget.
reference: It seems like the government took advantage of the crisis to avoid tabling a budget.
mt: We get the impression that the government took advantage of this situation to not table a budget.

source: Ce que j'étais en train de dire, c'est que nous imaginions que le gouvernement, après avoir été élu minoritaire, s'empresserait de négocier avec les partis, de déposer un budget et de faire des concessions.
reference: What I was saying was that we would have expected the government, upon winning a minority, to make an effort to negotiate with the parties, to present a budget and to make concessions.
mt: What I was saying was that we imagined that the government, after being elected as a minority government, would quickly negotiate with the parties, table a budget and make concessions.

source: Il a plutôt étiré la sauce et profité d'une pandémie pour ne pas déposer de budget, pour ne pas rendre de comptes et pour faire comme s'il avait carte blanche.
reference: Instead, it dragged things out and took advantage of the pandemic to avoid presenting a budget, to avoid being held accountable and to do whatever it wanted.
mt: Instead, it sauced and used a pandemic as an excuse not to table a budget, not to be accountable and to pretend that it had a blank cheque.

source: C'est à mon tour de me lever devant la Chambre pour parler du projet de loi <Document DbId="11283337" Type="3">C‑30, Loi n<Sup>o</Sup> 1 d'exécution du budget de 2021</Document>.
reference: It is now my turn to rise to speak to Bill <Document DbId="11283337" Type="3">C-30</Document>, the budget implementation act, 2021.
mt: It is my turn to rise in the House to speak to Bill <Document DbId="11283337" Type="3"> C-30, Budget Implementation Act, 2021, No. 1</Document> .

source: Après tout, c'est un budget qui ne ressemble à aucun autre budget qui l'a précédé dans l'histoire du Canada.
reference: This budget looks nothing like any other budget in Canadian history.
mt: After all, this budget is unlike any other budget in Canadian history.

source: Qu'y a-t-il dans le budget pour nous assurer que la diversification de notre économie va se poursuivre?
reference: What is in the budget to help maintain economic diversification in my region?
mt: What is in the budget to ensure that the diversification of our economy continues?

source: Qu'y a-t-il dans le budget pour protéger la population des régions productrices d'amiante?
reference: What is in the budget to protect people in regions that produce asbestos?
mt: What is in the budget to protect the population of asbestos-producing regions?

source: Il n'y a rien, mis à part un budget publicitaire, qu'Environnement Canada utilise pour faire peur aux gens sans donner de véritable solution.
reference: There is nothing, other than an advertising budget, which Environment Canada is using to scare people without providing any real solutions.
mt: There is nothing, other than an advertising budget, that Environment Canada uses to scare people without providing a real solution.

source: Cette semaine, nous avons pu voir un des effets négatifs du budget qui a été présenté par les libéraux: le taux d'inflation, qui a atteint un sommet jamais vu depuis 10 ans, se situant à 3,6 %.
reference: This week, we saw one of the negative effects of the Liberals' budget. The inflation rate hit 3.6%, the highest level in a decade.
mt: This week we saw one of the negative effects of the Liberal budget: the inflation rate, which is at an all-time high in 10 years, at 3.6%.

source: Cela signifie que ce budget représentera un réel problème pour toutes les générations de Canadiens.
reference: That means that this budget will be a real problem for all generations of Canadians.
mt: This means that this budget will be a real problem for all generations of Canadians.

source: Avant de terminer, je tiens à souligner que ce budget comporte deux éléments complètement inacceptables.
reference: Before I wrap things up, I want to stress that there are two absolutely unacceptable things in this budget.
mt: Before I close, I would like to point out that this budget contains two completely unacceptable elements.

source: Les jeunes aînés ont été complètement oubliés par le budget.
reference: There is absolutely nothing in this budget for younger seniors.
mt: Young seniors were completely forgotten in the budget.

source: Il ne sera donc pas surprenant que je vote contre un budget pareil, qui divise et qui va endetter des générations et des générations de Canadiens tout en ne faisant absolument rien pour protéger notre avenir ou créer des emplois.
reference: Therefore, it will come as no surprise that I should vote against such a budget, which divides and which will put generations upon generations of Canadians into debt, while doing absolutely nothing to protect our future or create jobs.
mt: It will come as no surprise that I will vote against such a divisive budget that will put generations and generations of Canadians into debt while doing absolutely nothing to protect our future or create jobs.

source: Il n'aura pas fallu beaucoup de temps pour que, d'un budget à l'autre, nous nous retrouvions non pas avec de petits, petits déficits, mais avec d'énormes déficits, et ce, avant même le début de la pandémie.
reference: It did not take long to go from teeny-tiny deficits in one budget to massive ones in the next, and this was even before the pandemic.
mt: It did not take a long time for us to find ourselves not with small deficits, small deficits, but huge deficits, even before the pandemic began.

source: Non, je ne crois plus un mot de ce que dit ce gouvernement quand il est question de prévisions et de budget.
reference: No, I do not believe a single word this government has to say about projections and budgets.
mt: No, I do not believe a word of what this government is saying when it comes to estimates and budgets.

source: Les libéraux contrôlent leur propre calendrier législatif. Pourtant, presque deux ans après les élections, nous nous retrouvons à la toute dernière minute pour adopter le premier budget de ce gouvernement depuis les élections.
reference: The Liberals are in charge of their own legislative calendar, yet almost two years after the election, here we are at the eleventh hour, being asked to pass this government's first budget since the election.
mt: The Liberals are controlling their own legislative calendar, but almost two years after the election, we are at the very last minute to pass this government's first budget since the election.

source: Dans le peu de temps dont je dispose aujourd'hui, je m'interroge sur la mise en œuvre du budget.
reference: In the short time I have today, I will focus on the implementation of the budget.
mt: In the short time I have today, I am wondering about the implementation of the budget.

source: Dès que le budget a été déposé, le Bloc québécois s'y est opposé.
reference: The Bloc Québécois opposed the budget from the moment it was presented.
mt: As soon as the budget was tabled, the Bloc Québécois opposed it.

source: Deux conditions nous semblaient essentielles dans un budget attendu depuis deux ans et qui suivait la crise sanitaire d'une grande pandémie.
reference: There were two elements that we saw as essential in a budget that we had been waiting for for two years and that followed a health crisis and major pandemic.
mt: Two conditions seemed essential to us in a budget that has been waiting for two years and that followed the health crisis of a major pandemic.

source: Comme porte-parole des travailleuses et des travailleurs, je dois dire au gouvernement qu'en ne posant pas ce geste attendu, il abandonne les travailleuses et les travailleurs qui ont tenu à bout de bras le régime et qui ont soigné des gens.
reference: As spokesperson for workers, I must tell the government that, by not doing what was expected, it is abandoning the workers who supported the health care system and treated people.
mt: As the spokesperson for workers, I must say to the government that, by not doing what is expected, it is abandoning the workers who have held up the system and cared for people.

source: Ce sont toutes des mesures que nous avons annoncées dans le budget de 2021 afin d'aider les agriculteurs à réduire les gaz à effet de serre sur leur ferme.
reference: These are all measures we announced in budget 2021 to help farmers reduce on-farm greenhouse gas emissions.
mt: These are all measures that we announced in budget 2021 to help farmers reduce greenhouse gases on their farms.

source: Si un député d'un parti reconnu présent à la Chambre désire demander un vote par appel nominal ou que la motion soit adoptée avec dissidence, je l'invite à se lever et à l'indiquer à la présidence.
reference: If a member of a recognized party present in the House wishes to request a recorded division or that the motion be adopted on division, I would invite them to rise and indicate it to the Chair.
mt: If a member of a recognized party present in the House wishes to request a recorded division or that the motion be adopted on division, I would invite them to rise and indicate it to the Chair.

source: Madame la Présidente, j'ai le plaisir de vous demander un vote par appel nominal.
reference: Madam Speaker, I am pleased to request a recorded division.
mt: Madam Speaker, I am pleased to ask you for a recorded division.

source: Ordres émanant du gouvernement
reference: Government Orders
mt: Government Orders

source: Ordres émanant du gouvernement
reference: Government Orders
mt: Government Orders

source: Loi n<Sup>o</Sup> 1 d’exécution du budget de 2021
reference: Budget Implementation Act, 2021, No. 1
mt: Budget Implementation Act, 2021, No. 1

source: La Chambre reprend l'étude, interrompue le 18 juin, du projet de loi <Document DbId="11283337" Type="3">C‑30, Loi portant exécution de certaines dispositions du budget déposé au Parlement le 19 avril 2021 et mettant en œuvre d'autres mesures</Document>, dont le comité a fait rapport avec des propositions d'amendement, ainsi que de la motion n<Sup>o</Sup> 2.
reference: The House resumed from June 18 consideration of Bill <Document DbId="11283337" Type="3">C-30, An Act to implement certain provisions of the budget tabled in Parliament on April 19, 2021 and other measures</Document>, as reported (with amendments) from the committee, and of Motion No. 2.
mt: The House resumed from June 18 consideration of Bill <Document DbId="11283337" Type="3"> C-30, An Act to implement certain provisions of the budget tabled in Parliament on April 19, 2021 and other measures</Document> , as reported (with amendments) from the committee, and of Motion No. 2.

source: Le projet de loi <Document DbId="11283337" Type="3">C‑30, Loi n<Sup>o</Sup> 1 d'exécution du budget de 2021</Document>, offre-t-il des garanties suffisantes pour protéger les travailleurs, pour protéger les chômeurs, pour protéger les travailleurs malades et pour agir dignement avec nos personnes aînées et les travailleurs qui leur donnent des soins?
reference: Does Bill <Document DbId="11283337" Type="3">C-30</Document>, budget implementation act, 2021, no. 1, provide adequate guarantees to protect workers, to protect the unemployed, to protect sick workers and to treat seniors and their care workers with dignity?
mt: Does Bill <Document DbId="11283337" Type="3"> C-30, Budget Implementation Act, 2021, No. 1</Document> , provide adequate safeguards to protect workers, to protect the unemployed, to protect sick workers and to act with dignity with our seniors and the workers who provide them with care?

source: Encore une fois, ce qu'on nous propose dans le budget, c'est un critère unique d'admissibilité de 420 heures pour une durée d'une année.
reference: Once again, all the budget offers is a single, 420-hour eligibility requirement for a period of one year.
mt: Once again, what is being proposed in the budget is a single eligibility criterion of 420 hours for a year.

source: Depuis la présentation du budget à la Chambre, nous demandons un ajustement pour que les gens puissent continuer de recevoir les 500 $ par semaine.
reference: Since the budget was tabled in House, we have been calling for an adjustment to allow people to continue to receive $500 a week.
mt: Since the budget was tabled in the House, we have been asking for an adjustment so that people can continue to receive the $500 a week.

source: Que pense mon collègue de cet aspect du budget et des intrusions dans les champs de compétence?
reference: What does my colleague think of this aspect of the budget and jurisdictional meddling?
mt: What does my colleague think about this aspect of the budget and the intrusion into areas of jurisdiction?

source: Projet de loi C‑12 — Motion d'attribution de temps
reference: Bill C‑12—Time Allocation Motion
mt: Bill C-12—Time Allocation Motion

source: b) au plus une heure soit accordée aux délibérations à l’étape du rapport et, à la fin de la période prévue pour l’étape du rapport, toute délibération devant la Chambre soit interrompue, s’il y a lieu, aux fins de cet ordre et, par la suite, toute motion nécessaire pour disposer de cette étape du projet de loi sera mise aux voix immédiatement et successivement, sans autre débat ni amendement, pourvu que, si un vote par appel nominal est demandé sur une quelconque motion, il ne sera pas différé, sauf conformément à l’article 76.1(8) du Règlement;
reference: (b) not more than one hour shall be allotted to the consideration of the bill at report stage and, at the conclusion of the time provided at report stage, any proceedings before the House shall be interrupted, if required for the purpose of this order, and in turn every question necessary for the disposal of the said stage of the bill shall be put forthwith and successively, without further debate or amendment, provided that, if a recorded division is requested on any motion, it shall not be deferred, except pursuant to Standing Order 76.1(8);
mt: (b) not more than one hour shall be allotted for the consideration of the report stage of the bill and, at the expiry of the time provided for the report stage, any proceedings before the House shall be interrupted, if required for the purpose of this order, and in turn every motion necessary for the disposal of the said stage of the bill shall be put forthwith and successively, without further debate or amendment, provided that, if a recorded division is requested on any motion, it shall not be deferred, except pursuant to Standing Order 76.1(8);

source: d) lorsque le projet de loi est étudié à l’étape de la troisième lecture, un député de chaque parti reconnu et un député du Parti vert puissent prendre chacun la parole pendant au plus 10 minutes, suivies de cinq minutes de questions et d’observations et, à la fin de la période prévue pour le débat ou lorsqu’aucun député ne se lève pour prendre la parole, selon la première éventualité, toute question nécessaire pour disposer de l’étape de la troisième lecture du projet de loi soit mise aux voix immédiatement et successivement, sans plus ample débat ni amendement, pourvu que, si un vote par appel nominal est demandé sur une quelconque motion, il ne soit pas différé;
reference: (d) when the bill is taken up at the third reading stage, a member of each recognized party and a member of the Green Party each be allowed to speak for not more than 10 minutes followed by five minutes for questions and comments and, at the conclusion of the time provided for debate or when no member rises to speak, whichever is earlier, all questions necessary for the disposal of the third reading stage of the bill shall be put forthwith and successively, without further debate or amendment provided that, if a recorded division is requested on any motion, it shall not be deferred; and
mt: (d) when the bill is considered at third reading, a member of each recognized party and a member of the Green Party may speak for not more than 10 minutes, followed by five minutes of questions and comments, and at the end of the time provided for debate or when no member rises to speak, whichever is earlier, all questions necessary to dispose of the third reading stage of the bill shall be put forthwith and successively without further debate or amendment, provided that, if a recorded division is requested on any motion, it shall not be deferred;

source: Je voudrais cependant me concentrer sur autre chose, soit la trajectoire prévue du Canada relativement à l'augmentation de l'exploitation des sables bitumineux, incompatible avec trois éléments: limiter le réchauffement climatique à 1,5 degré, atteindre la carboneutralité d'ici 2050, et respecter les années jalons indiquées dans la Loi.
reference: Nevertheless, I would like to concentrate on plans to increase Canadian oil sands development, which is incompatible with three things: limiting global warming to 1.5 degrees, achieving net zero by 2050 and hitting the targets for the milestone years in the act.
mt: However, I would like to focus on something else, which is Canada's projected trajectory in increasing oil sands development, which is incompatible with three elements: limiting global warming to 1.5 degrees, reaching net-zero emissions by 2050, and respecting the milestones set out in the act.

source: À un moment de l'étude, le Parti vert avait proposé un amendement qui était identique à un amendement du gouvernement.
reference: At one point during the study, the Green Party proposed an amendment that was identical to a government amendment.
mt: At one time, the Green Party proposed an amendment that was identical to a government amendment.

source: Le dévouement des libéraux et des néo-démocrates à ne jamais envisager d'autres amendements que les leurs a effectivement tué l'un de leurs propres amendements.
reference: The Liberals and New Democrats are so staunchly opposed to any amendment other than their own that they ended up killing one of their own amendments.
mt: The dedication of the Liberals and the NDP to never consider other amendments that their own amendments actually killed.

source: Bien sûr, Environnement et Changement climatique Canada est le ministère clé, mais nous avons besoin d'une coordination avec ceux de l'Industrie, des Finances, des Ressources naturelles, de l'Emploi, des Relations Couronne-Autochtones et bien d'autres.
reference: Of course, Environment and Climate Change Canada is the key department, but it also needs to coordinate with the departments of industry, finance, natural resources, employment, crown-indigenous relations and many others.
mt: Of course, Environment and Climate Change Canada is the key department, but we need to coordinate with Industry, Finance, Natural Resources, Employment, Crown-Indigenous Relations and many others.

source: Malheureusement, les libéraux et les néo-démocrates ont même refusé de débattre, et ils ont rejeté chaque amendement que nous avions proposé à cette fin.
reference: Unfortunately, the Liberals and the NDP even refused to debate, and they rejected every amendment we proposed for that purpose.
mt: Unfortunately, the Liberals and the NDP have even refused to debate, and they have rejected every amendment that we have proposed to that end.

source: Dans leur monde de rêve, le <Affiliation DbId="253376" Type="4">ministre de l'Environnement et du Changement climatique</Affiliation> est une figure toute puissante qui dicte toute politique par décret.
reference: In their dream world, the <Affiliation DbId="253376" Type="4">Minister of Environment and Climate Change</Affiliation> is an omnipotent figure who dictates every policy by decree.
mt: In their dream world, the <Affiliation DbId="253376" Type="4"> Minister of Environment and Climate Change</Affiliation> is a powerful figure that dictates any policy by order in council.

source: Nous croyons en la collaboration et en l'importance de travailler ensemble, en particulier au sujet de la question du changement climatique.
reference: We believe in collaboration and the importance of working together, especially on the issue of climate change.
mt: We believe in collaboration and the importance of working together, particularly on the issue of climate change.

source: Le changement climatique est réel et nous avons absolument besoin de tous les efforts pour y faire face.
reference: Climate change is real, and we absolutely need everyone to work hard to address it.
mt: Climate change is real and we absolutely need to do everything we can to address it.

source: C'est parce qu'il vient des conservateurs.
reference: Because it came from the Conservatives.
mt: It is because he is from the Conservatives.

source: Monsieur Pitfield est aussi le propriétaire de Data Sciences, une entreprise qui fait du soutien technique pour la Libéraliste, cette liste partisane de pointage du Parti libéral.
reference: Mr. Pitfield is also the owner of Data Sciences, a business that offers technical support for the Liberalist, the partisan scoring list of the Liberal Party.
mt: Mr. Pitfield is also the owner of Data Sciences, a company that provides technical support for the Liberalist, this partisan Liberal Party pointlist.

source: Or, on apprend aujourd’hui que 97 % des députés libéraux, soit 149 d’entre eux, se sont servi de leur budget de circonscription pour payer les services de Data Sciences.
reference: We learned today that 97% of Liberal members, or 149 of them, used their constituency budgets to pay for Data Sciences' services.
mt: However, today we learned that 97% of Liberal MPs, 149 of them, used their riding budgets to pay for Data Sciences.

source: Je trouve particulier que les conservateurs essaient de changer la discussion actuellement parce que ce qui se passe est une honte.
reference: I find it a little odd that the Conservatives are trying to change the channel right now, because what is going on is shameful.
mt: I find it odd that the Conservatives are trying to change the discussion right now because what is happening is shameful.

source: Les bénéfices de plusieurs programmes se termineront dans neuf jours si le budget n'est pas adopté. Or, que font les conservateurs?
